newsitem.title: SPAIN: Eleven immigrants killed in Spain truck accident.
newsitem.headline: Eleven immigrants killed in Spain truck accident.

text.p: Eleven North African immigrants died and seven were seriously injured when a Portuguese-registered truck overturned in northern Spain, police said on Monday.
The cause of the accident, which happened late on Sunday about 15 km (nine miles) from the French border near the town of Figueres, was unknown.
The truck was carrying illegal immigrants hidden in a trailer with a cargo of perfume bottles, police said.
